content:
I've renamed and recolored a couple labels on the reference repo:

  • "needs-reviewer" -> "S-needs-reviewer"
  • "Waiting on Stabilization" -> "S-waiting-on-stabilization"
  • Added "S-waiting-on-review" for the same purpose as the same tag on the main repo.
  • Removed "nominated" since it was for docs team meetings. Can be re-added for a new purpose.

They're also all using the color #d3dddd, same as the S- tags on the main repo.
